attributes.action: Make Sign Language/ BSL part of the national curriculum
attributes.additional_details: There are 11million deaf people in the UK yet only 151,000 people are able to sign or correctly use BSL. Making the education of sign language/ BSL compulsory would not only make deaf people feel more included but also help others to understand why it is helpful and important
attributes.background: Make sign language compulsory in education instead of or as well as learning a second language like Spanish/Germany etc

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/331031
